nodes.text: Pinewood Studios is a British film and television studio situated in Iver Heath, Buckinghamshire, approximately 20 miles (32 km) west of central London. It has served as a production facility for every Star Wars film made since the 2012 acquisition of Lucasfilm Ltd. by The Walt Disney Company.
Several sets for Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker were created at Pinewood Studios. These included Exegol, Ajan Kloss, Kijimi City and the interior of a Star Destroyer.
